text: Time FM (时光电台) is a comedy series produced by Dreamteam Studios and ntv7 in 2011. It features Adrian Tan, Yeo Yann Yann, Alvin Wong, Jane Ng, and Melvin Sia. The show has 13 episodes and began airing on 28 April 2011, every Thursday at 11 pm. ==Synopsis== Time FM is a comedy series about Ke Jun Xiong, who can time travel to the 1980s at Time FM.http://www.tianchad.com/2011/05/time-fm-live-on-ntv7.html TIME FM LIVE ON ntv7 On his first day as an office boy, he uses a special toilet that sends him back to 1981.http://www.mmail.com.my/content/69513-sparks-fly-over-hand- prop Sparks fly over hand prop Each episode begins with a newspaper quote from 1981, mostly about Mahathir Mohamad, the Prime Minister of Malaysia at that time. The show gives viewers a look at Mahathir’s work and early years as Prime Minister. ==Cast== *Adrian Chen Kai Xuan as Ke Junxiong / Ke Huan *Yeo Yann Yann as Lucky Jie *Alvin Wong as Hua Tai Zhang / Jian Hua Lang *Melvin Sia Melvin Sia defends his acting style as Zhang Jia Ming / Cikgu Cheong *Jane Ng Ming Hui as Huang Wan Jun *Qin Wen Bing as Xia Lei Meng *Ken Tan as You Cha Gui *Ye Qing Fang as Lao Chi Cheong *Zhu Jian Mei as Xiao Niu / Tea Lady ==References== Category:2011 television series debuts
title: Time FM (TV series)
